Text: You are awesome ! Cheers From Canada my friend, my F1 season would consist of looking online to see who won without you. Thank you for an awesome season and great work
YES YES YES! I love you footy, thanks again although I already gave you my words of praise on your BBC upload. C ya next year ;)
Thanks mate, you've done a great job, now you can take a break until next March.  Thanks again for all the races, without yourself it would be pretty bleak here in Alberta for F1 coverage.......
Thanks.

Footy
Many thanks from the West Coast for bringing US quality options to view your favorite sports. WOW what a season!
tx for the awsome season footy. hope to c u again nxt yr

Thnx man! I live in Sweden and even though I've got the channel that airs formula 1 I wait for your ul's from SkySport... Plz keep up the excellent job u'r doing so that this swede get to watch some dedicated british F1 coverage from SkySports ;)
Thank you so much @footy, for all this awesome season, thanks for the quality, no ads, and Sky Sports!!! (XD)

What a fantastic season courtesy of our good man footy. 
Thanks again for your consistent hard work from all the F1 nutters down under here in NZ, hope to see you back next season!
Dude, you are too much. BBC AND Sky? Once again, thanks for all of your efforts. Great season wot?

@footy. Just want to take this opportunity to thank you for a season well covered. Like others have already said, for some of us we wouldn't have enjoyed the season as much as we did had it not been for your superb job. Keep up the good work mate, "See" you next season.

This is the last time I'll get to say this this year.  Thank you so much for all of the Formula One uploads that you've provided this year.  I am grateful for your generosity of spirit.  I hope to see your F1 posts again in 2013.

I doubt you read these but:

I live in the US and there is absolutely no way to watch if not for ULs to TPB.  I got into the sport in 2009 from downloading races.  In 2010 I started giving a shit about qualy.  A few weeks ago I went to the race in Austin.  If it wasn't for your efforts, and the ease of watching I wouldn't have gone, wouldn't have cared.  Thanks for doing what is seemingly a thankless job.  

Also, he puts standard def for the xbox'ers and hd for PC viewing.  That's a ton more work.  Thanks again from damn-near-Canada.
I also doubt I'd have joined a Karting League either it not for you, footy.

@ nobodynever: I do read the comments, All the best in the Karting League.

I am glad that you have all enjoyed this season, there may be a few more uploads to come for this season, like the season review.
Thanks Footy for your generous efforts this season.  I hope we see you again next season and I hope you have a wonderful winter.

Seed please! :) 
Thank you footy ;) 
Loved the F1 torrents.
Thank you to footy for all you uploaded and to seeders too!

What an amazing race! And what a fantastic F1 season this was! I want to thank you for all those races you uploaded. I don't have tv so without people like you I wouldn't be able to watch F1 races. Thanks a lot, see you next year I hope :)
Thanks for the uploads all season, footy!
Thanks for doing such a wonderful job all season Footy. Many an hour was spent enjoying those amazing races you put up! Cheers!

thanks footy for all ur uploads, without u i couldnt have seen any of the races...
THANKS THANKS THANKS THANKS THANKS ALOT !!!
& hope to see u in March ...

Thanks Sir. Footy,
May God bless you for your generosity towards us.
You're awsome!

I am waiting patiently, avoiding all news, for the BBC version. Any chance of putting it up soon? 
Many, many thanks!!

Thank yoĂş!!! Awesome work from you!!!
I rly hope i could enjoy youre F1 coverage in 2013 again. This was just unbelivable!!! THANKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Thank you for all your efforts my friend, it was a wonderful season.

Hi footy,

any chance to get the BBC Forum of the Brazilian GP 2012?

And thanx alot from Sweden for your work this year!!!
Cheers from Norway. Thank you for all your uploads this season.
BBC race and forum : http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7861242/

@footy, where to begin! 2012 has been a difficult year for me, but every other week or so this sport gave me a few hours of escape. Mostly due to economic reasons it was almost impossible to watch the races live, but thanks to you I have seen every qualification and race this season. In the long run I guess you could say you were one of the persons that made 2012 just a little bit easier. Thank you
Wow... is that my username.. never trust your friends to create accounts for you I guess. So sorry

Any Chance of the SKY coverage in HD footy ?
and Id like to know where the show went after it was cut off after the post race, did it continue ? or did they just go off air ?
The post race stopped after they said their goodbyes, there was no interview with Seb.
